alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:53PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT STOREY...SOUTHERN WASHOE... DOUGLAS AND NORTHERN LYON COUNTIES AND CARSON CITY THROUGH 415 PM PDT... At 352 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carson City, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Heavy rains may cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Carson City, Virginia City, Dayton, Johnson Lane, Washoe City, Pleasant Valley, Carson City Airport, Galena, Indian Hills, New Washoe City, Washoe Lake Campground, Us 395 At Douglas-Carson City Co Line, Mount Rose Ski Area, Lakeview, Gold Hill, Davis Creek Campground, Mount Rose Summit, Stewart, Minden-Tahoe Airport, and Us 50 At Carson City-Lyon Co Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area
